casebody.data:
Leslie BURNS, Landry Davis, Edith Dozier, Carrie Ferguson, Jamekelea Pinkston, Linette Richard, Yarkeshala Waldon, Kimberly Walker, Kenneth Brad Ott, Edwin Ray Parker, and the American Federation of State, County, and Municipal Employees, Council 17
v.
LOUISIANA STATE UNIVERSITY HEALTH SCIENCES CENTER-SHREVEPORT and The Department of State Civil Service NO. 2017-C-0483 Supreme Court of Louisiana. June 15, 2018 Denied. WEIMER, J., would grant.

HUGHES, J., would grant.
